segments.text: I see the woman standing in the puddle, and it’s almost funny how she doesn’t react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just focused on that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to make it, but that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, and it’s cute how she’s reaching up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’re going to get caught before they even get to eat the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and it’s making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned it off yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments where everything is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
